import { useNavigate } from "react-location"; export default function CreateCard({ formData, setFormData }) { const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleChange = (e) => { let isChecked = e.target.checked; setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.value]: isChecked }); }; const handleClick = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // DON'T REFRESH THE PAGE navigate({ to: "showcase", replace: true }); }; return (

DevCard

Your personal digital portfolio

Create your DevCard

setFormData({ ...formData, [fullName]: e.target.value }) } />
setFormData({ ...formData, aboutMe: e.target.value }) } />

Technologies You Know

setFormData({ ...formData, githubURL: e.target.value }) } />
setFormData({ ...formData, twitterURL: e.target.value }) } />
setFormData({ ...formData, favouriteBooks: e.target.value }) } />
); }
